description: This file defines routing logic for a Flutter mobile application. It includes route constants, route map for named navigation, and a route generator method that handles navigation with typed arguments for different screens in the app.

classes.name: ListingArgs
classes.description: Represents optional category slug argument for Listing screen filtering.

classes.name: ProductArgs
classes.description: Wraps a Book object for passing to ProductDetailScreen.

classes.name: CheckoutArgs
classes.description: Wraps a Book object for checkout preview screen.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: Provides static route definitions, route map, and route factory methods for the app navigation.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: Static getter providing the mapping of route names to widget builder functions, with support for passing arguments.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Static method that dynamically creates routes based on RouteSettings, handling argument parsing and default error routes.
